body:
Hi djordje, Thanks. I have added terrain Mesh output to LB terrain generator, you can find an example file on [Hydra](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=AntonelloDN&fork=hydra&id=3D_terrain_model&slide=0&scale=1&offset=0,0). If you want and if you are interested you could do a couple of tests to compare the two components. I suggest you don't go over 2000 meters of radius, you shouldn't have crash problem but it could require lots of time (minutes). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/O*H55*IOAAEgGtxCRZiXtlADZwZI7gYR0R9MVJBt2E8LIOM82GWkUhiqJdJtQCA8yc4Ey4Zp-RsO1PqNZN3AzEsHgqtJ*GZB/test02.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/O*H55*IOAAFA2urjGpu9gTqapk3uOP*ptj4LrXnq9p2NPQiQ80LtXqTXSXlyyTtBxDwvNYDNjWu2NuaDxHuhtDa5rxdNdvcp/test01.png) Best
Antonello
